entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:35 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 09:00 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Overcast. High minus 1.
